articles.title: Kim Jong Un Meets Fighter Pilots' Expedition of Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Meets Fighter Pilots' Expedition of Mt. Paektu Area
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Fighter pilots of the Korean People's Army toured the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu from April 11, on orders of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un. 
					 On April 17 Kim Jong Un met on the spot with those pilots who successfully finished the tour and gave a pep-talk to them.
					
					 He attended an oath-taking meeting of the fighter pilots held in the compound of the Samjiyon Grand Monument where the statue of President Kim Il Sung stands.
					
					 He made a speech there.
					
					 He said he was very pleased to meet them in Samjiyon County where leader Kim Jong Il was born and which is very near to Mt. Paektu, a sacred mountain of the revolution where the Songun (army-first) revolution began and the Korean revolution took root.
					
					 He said he made a long journey, shelving all the state affairs, not only to show his love for the fighter pilots but also to implant the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, deeper in the hearts of them who spent the Day of the Sun, the greatest national holiday, in snow-stormy Mt. Paektu area.
					
					 What is most precious for the fighter pilots is the revolutionary faith, he said, and went on: Showdown in the sky is that of idea and faith and the revolutionary faith and spirit is the basic factor decisive of victory in showdown in the sky where there is no room to step back.
					
					 It is the fixed resolution and will of the Workers' Party of Korea to defend the revolutionary traditions and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, he stressed.
					
					 It is hard to expect the victory of the Korean revolution without the revolutionary traditions and the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, he said, adding: We should struggle with burning hearts, like the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters who won victory weathering all hardships and ordeals, always looking up to Mt. Paektu, and thus glorify the revolutionary feats of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for all ages and carry forward the revolutionary traditions of Paektu.
					
					 He indicated the tasks and ways for a fresh turn in rounding off the combat preparations of the Air and Anti-Air Force and strengthening its combat capabilities.
					
					 The fighter pilots should become the first followers and implementers of the Party's idea and cause and thus lead the whole army in making it politically, ideologically and morally stronger, he said.
					
					 He also called upon them to keep themselves in a regular combat posture, under the slogan that they always wait only for the sortie order from the Party, and firmly prepare themselves to be a-match-for-a-hundred red goshawks defending the Party and the revolution in the sky.
					
					 The Party entrusts the very clear and blue sky of the country entirely to the fighter pilots, he said, adding he would always stand by the heroic fighter pilots defending the country's blue sky.
					
					 He ardently called upon all of them to vigorously fight for the final victory in the building of a thriving socialist nation, cherishing deeper in mind the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 Then oath-taking speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The speakers made a firm resolution that the red goshawks of Kim Jong Un's guerilla army would carry through the important tasks set forth by the Supreme Commander in his historic speech and thus dash toward the targets, pointed by the Supreme Commander, before anyone else when an order is issued and win in the great war for national reunification.
					
					 A letter of pledge to the Supreme Commander was adopted at the meeting. 
					
					 The Supreme Commander had a photo session with members of the KPA fighter pilots' expedition of the revolutionary battle sites in Mt. Paektu area in front of the statue of Kim Il Sung at the Samjiyon Grand Monument. 
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Ri Jae Il and Ri Pyong Chol.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Goes Up Mt. Paektu with Fighter Pilots of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Goes Up Mt. Paektu with Fighter Pilots of KPA
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, climbed the top of Mt. Paektu at dawn of Saturday, together with the members of KPA fighter pilots' expedition of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 With a broad smile on his face, the Supreme Commander said that the looks of Mt. Paektu is impressive and the sunrise over Mt. Paektu is a charming and beautiful sight rare to be seen, adding the new morning of Korea dawns from Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Mt. Paektu is the ancestral mountain and the sacred mountain of revolution associated with the soul of the Korean nation and suggesting the spirit of Songun Korea, and it is the cradle of the Korean revolution, the symbol of victory and the eternal beacon of the Songun (army-first) revolution, he said, adding:
					
					 When one climbs snow-stormy Mt. Paektu and undergoes the blizzards over it, one can experience its real spirit and harden the resolution to accomplish the Korean revolution. Climbing Mt. Paektu provides precious mental pabulum more powerful than any kind of nuclear weapon and it is the way for carrying forward the revolutionary traditions of Paektu and giving steady continuity to the glorious Korean revolution. 
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, is the noble spirit the army and people of the DPRK should keep in their minds forever, he said, adding that they will have nothing to fear and they will do everything when they live in the spirit.
					
					 Saying that the Korean revolution started in Mt. Paektu is not yet over, he expressed expectation and belief that the fighter pilots would fully discharge their mission as heirs to the Songun revolution. And he had a photo session with them on the top of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Ri Jae Il and Ri Pyong Chol.

articles.title: Federal Secretary of Left Bloc of Austrian Trade Union Federation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Federal Secretary of Left Bloc of Austrian Trade Union Federation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Oliver Jonischkeit, federal secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, and his party visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests laid a bouquet at his old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 Then they went round historic relics, being briefed on the glorious revolutionary history of the President and the patriotic careers of his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 At the end of the visit the federal secretary said that the old home in Mangyongdae is a time-honored place which has weighty significance in hewing out the destiny of the Korean people.
					
					 Many people visit it because the President performed great exploits by devoting his all to the Korean and world revolution, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The President's revolutionary idea is the great idea that should be carried forward down through generations.
					
					 The guests visited the venue of the 17th Kimilsungia Festival, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and other places.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Namhung Youth Chemical Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Namhung Youth Chemical Complex
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju inspected the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex.
					 He visited various places of the complex including the catalyst shop and the fertilizer loading shop to learn in detail about the production and supply of fertilizers for this year's farming and supply of raw materials before holding a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting underlined the importance of settling the food problem in decisively improving the people's living standard and the urgent need to boost the fertilizer production.
					
					 The meeting also discussed issues of channeling efforts into improving the management of equipment and technical control, ensuring safe supply of electricity, boosting the coal production in keeping with increasing fertilizer production, minutely organizing and commanding transport and cutting down the turn round time of freight cars transporting coal  and took relevant measures.
					
					 Earlier, the premier inspected the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory, where he urged it to develop natural and functional cosmetics liked by the people and improve their quality.

articles.title: Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Leaves
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo left here on Sunday.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Actions Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Actions Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Fierce anti-"government" actions were staged in south Korea on April 16, the one year since the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 A large-scale memorial rally took place in Seoul to demand the probe into the truth about the disaster.
					
					 Memorial processions were held, to begin with, by students of Ehwa Woman's University, Yonsei University, Sogang University, Myongji University, Kyunghui University and Sukmyong Woman's University.
					
					 The rally was attended by civic and public organizations including the All-People Measure Council for Sewol Disaster and the April 16 Family Consultative Council and students and citizens, more than 65 000.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants started a demonstration.
					
					 That day the security authorities cracked down on the demonstration with at least 10 000 policemen of 130 companies of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency and other local police agency and more than 300 vehicles involved.
					
					 Enraged at this, demonstrators made a strong protest.
					
					 The police walked off demonstrators while spraying tear gas liquid but they staged a sit-in strike and demo at the dawn of the next day, too, not yielding to their suppression.
					
					 A protest action took place at Phaengmok Port, Jin Island, South Jolla Province, to honor the memory of the victims of the ferry Sewol disaster and demand the probe into the truth about it. 
					
					 Members of civic and public bodies made public a resolution at their memorial service.
					
					 The deceptive and formal memorial service staged by the puppet chief executive that day touched off bitterer resentment among members of civic organizations.
					
					 Meanwhile, members of youth organizations staged a protest action against Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: British Organizations Praise Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
British Organizations Praise Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea jointly posted on a homepage a special article accompanied with a photo of President Kim Il Sung on April 7 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The reverence of the followers of the Juche idea for the President is growing ever deeper, the article said.
					
					 It noted that the President was the tender-hearted father of the Korean people and the most prominent leader of the world socialist movement. 
					
					 He fathered the Juche idea on which all the lines and policies of the DPRK are based and developed the DPRK into the country strong in independence on which no the imperialists' domination and big powers' interferences and pressures work, it noted.
					
					 Though passed away, he is still deeply revered not only by the Korean people but by all other revolutionary and progressive people, it said, adding: 
					
					 The Juche idea and Korean-style socialism, legacies of the President were successfully developed and enriched and carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il and they are now being brought to completion by HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in South Africa, Switzerland and China and seminars in Italy and Thailand between April 10 and 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung
					 Displayed at the venues of those events were photos documenting the undying exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works, and books and photos introducing the true picture of Songun Korea. 
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, praised the President as a great thinker and theoretician who founded the immortal Juche idea and a prominent leader who projected the popular masses as masters of revolution and construction and wisely led the cause of independence to victory.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, said the President is always alive in the hearts of humankind for the undying exploits he performed for the times and history. 
					
					 Mustafa Al Safarini, chairman of the Arab Information Center in China, noted the President was an elder statesman who led the Korean people to emerge an independent and revolutionary people. 
					
					 Franco Costanzi, secretary general of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche idea, praised the President for defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialist powers in one generation and developed the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, adding that his exploits would shine forever.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Posted by British Organization on Its Homepage
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Posted by British Organization on Its Homepage
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its homepage President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country", leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" and Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" on April 11. 
					 The President's work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively indicates the ways of achieving the great national unity such as the issue of founding a reunified state through the great national unity and achieving unity on the basis of patriotism and the spirit of national independence, the issue of promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests and stopping all partisan disputes fanning up split and confrontation between compatriots, the necessity for the north and the south to trust and unite with each other and the issue of not rejecting people because of differing isms but joining hands on the road of national reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's work, published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998), deals with the five-point policy for the great national unity which serves as important guidelines for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's work, published on April 6, Juche 101(2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the Korean revolutionary cause to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Venezuela
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Venezuela
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea was held in Venezuela on April 11.
					 Present there were personages of various circles, members of groups for the study of the Juche idea and friendship and solidarity organizations with the Korean people and other Venezuelans.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a speech:
					
					 It was the greatest exploit that the President set forth the idea of attaching importance to arms and applied it to practice.
					
					 Thanks to this idea the DPRK could emerge a military power and resolutely counter the U.S. imperialists' moves for aggression. 
					
					 The President was, indeed, a genius of revolution and outstanding statesman who wisely led the Korean people to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and make dynamic progress towards peace, independence and prosperity despite the ever-escalating moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Adina Bastidas, former vice-president of Venezuela, said the Juche idea founded by the President was the original idea and it was urgently required by the reality of Venezuela, adding: It is of great significance for us to follow the Juche idea.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held Abroad
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions were held in Russia, Peru and Nigeria from April 4 to 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos documenting the undying exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works, books and photos showing the true picture of the great Paektusan nation advancing under the banner of Songun and handicrafts associated with wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Maritime Territory Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, History and Culture of the DPRK and other speakers expressed conviction that the DPRK will surely emerge as a thriving socialist nation as it is led by Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started and triumphantly advanced by the President and Kim Jong Il and the people deeply trust their leaders.
					
					 The rector of a Peruvian university said the exhibition would make a great contribution to developing the friendship between the peoples of the two countries, cultural exchange and cooperation, in particular. 
					
					 The permanent secretary of the Ministry of Labor in Yobe State, Nigeria noted that the Korean people would certainly achieve the national reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se reune con pilotos de EPC, participantes en recorrido por zona del Paektu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se reune con pilotos de EPC, participantes en recorrido por zona del Paektu
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- A las ordenes del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los pilotos del EPC realizaron desde el dia 11 el recorrido por los campos de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu.
					El Comandante Supremo se reunio el dia 17 en el terreno con los pilotos que llevaron a feliz termino el recorrido.
					
					Tomo parte en el acto de juramento de los pilotos, efectuado en el campo de educacion frente a la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung, erguida en el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon.
					
					En la ocasion, el Mariscal pronuncio un discurso.
					
					El dijo que esta muy contento encontrarse con los pilotos en el distrito natal del Dirigente Kim Jong Il cerca del sagrado monte Paektu que dio origen a la revolucion de Songun y la revolucion coreana.
					
					Acudio alli poniendo aparte todos los asuntos del Estado, no solo por el sentimiento unido con los pilotos sino tambien para  infundirles mas el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu a los que celebraron el Dia del Sol, maxima fiesta nacional en la zona del monte Paektu, senalo.
					
					Lo mas importante para los pilotos es la fe revolucionaria, senalo y continuo que la confrontacion con el enemigo en el cielo es la de idea y fe y el factor fundamental que decide la victoria o la derrota es la fe y el espiritu revolucionarios.
					
					Prosiguio que es firme la decision y voluntad del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de mantener las tradiciones revolucionarias y lograr la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu.
					
					Al margen de las tradiciones y espiritu revolucionarios del Paektu, no se puede pensar en la victoria de la revolucion coreana, dijo y subrayo que debemos glorificar para siempre las hazanas revolucionarias de los grandes lideres y heredar las tradiciones revolucionarias del Paektu, al luchar siempre con abnegacion como hicieron los combatientes antijaponeses superando todo tipo de las dificultades.
					
					El Mariscal presento las tareas y remedios para lograr un nuevo cambio en la perfeccion de los preparativos combativos y el fortalecimiento de la capacidad combativa de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC.
					
					El exhorto a los pilotos a ser primeros partidarios y cumplidores de la idea y la causa del Partido y ponerse a la cabeza del EPC en realizar la transformacion del EPC en el  poderoso ejercito ideo-politico y moral.
					
					Senalo que los pilotos deben mantenerse siempre en el estado de combate y prepararse firmemente como azores rojos invencibles del Partido y la revolucion, bajo la consigna "!Esperamos la orden de despegue del partido!".
					
					Continuo que el Partido asigno a los pilotos toda la responsabilidad de defensa del cielo azul de la patria y el estara siempre junto con los pilotos valientes.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un exhorto fervorosamente a luchar con vigor para la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, al guardar profundamente el espiritu revolucionaria del Paektu, espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu.
					
					En el acto, hubo discursos de juramento.
					
					Los oradores decidieron materializar cabalmente las tareas programaticas presentadas en el discurso historico del Comandante Supremo y arremeter primero a los blancos fijados por el Comandante Supremo si el de la orden para aniquilar a los enemigos y lograr la victoria en la guerra por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					En el acto fue aprobada una carta de juramento dirigida al Comandante Supremo.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un se fotografio ante la estatua de bronce del Presidente erguida en el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon junto con los pilotos del EPC participantes en el recorrido por los campos de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Ri Jae Il y Ri Pyong Chol.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un sube al monte Paektu con pilotos del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un sube al monte Paektu con pilotos del EPC
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un subio a la madrugada del dia 18 al monte Paektu con los pilotos del Ejercito Popular de Corea, participantes en el recorrido por los campos de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu.
					El Mariscal dijo con amplia sonrisa que el impetu del monte Paektu es siempre majestuoso, la salida del sol del monte Paektu es el paisaje tan hermoso que no se puede ver en cualquier lugar y el dia de Corea despunta desde el monte Paektu.
					
					El Paektu es el monte ancestral y el monte sagrado de la revolucion donde estan impregnados el espiritu de la nacion coreana y el impetu de la Corea del Songun y es el origen de la revolucion coreana, el simbolo de la victoria y el faro eterno de la revolucion del Songun, subrayo.
					
					Al probar el viento cortante del monte Paektu, uno puede conocer correctamente cual es el monte Paektu y toma la firme decision de de lograr al pie de la letra la revolucion coreana, dijo y continuo que el camino al monte Paektu nos ofrece el alimento espiritual incomparable con el poderio de los armas nucleares, glorifica la tradicion revolucionaria del Paektu y hace heredar firmemente la revolucion coreana llena de glorias.
					
					Y prosiguio que el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu es el noble espiritu que nuestro ejercito y pueblo deben guardar siempre en el corazon y si viven con este espiritu, no habra en el mundo lo miedoso y lo imposible.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dijo que no termino todavia la marcha de la revolucion coreana iniciada en el monte Paektu.
					
					Al expresar la conviccion y esperanza de que los pilotos asuman con su mision como herederos de la revolucion del Songun se fotografio junto con ellos en el pico del monte Paektu.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Ri Jae Il y Ri Pyong Chol.
